title: Home
text:
I am a design technologist pushing positive mission driven projects forward with visual design and web technology specializing in identity design, interface design, front-end web development, and data visualization.

Experiences are moments facilitated by design. Often these moments are solutions to problems – created to help us live more fulfilling lives.

capabilities.name: Identity Design
capabilities.text: Your visual identity embodies your mission and vision and is key to formalizing your company and engaging your audience.

capabilities.name: Interface Design
capabilities.text: Interfaces are unique and usable experiences that meet your audience’s needs embedded with your mission and vision.

capabilities.name:
Front-end
Development
capabilities.text: Front-end development is the crafting of your experience using the latest standards in web technology and accessibility.

capabilities.name: Data Visualization
capabilities.text: Data drives your organization and visualizations communicate complex ideas and identify patterns to all of your stakeholders.
